name: Bouncing Blast
description:
Game made as the first Task "One Time Use" for the University GameDev League 2022 by Nine66

Controls:
Mouse - move camera
RMB - shoot
Spacebar - activate power up

Team:
Rodrigo Pires (Designer)
Pedro Fernandes (Programmer)

Pedro Osório (Programmer)
Pedro Torres (Programmer)
